Text: Curve manager New Version Cc PST Hello All The new version of curve manager is out in production The new features in this version are Position history for up to three days can be viewed A new position report called Position Difference is available now This report gives the difference between the positions of the selected date and the date prior to that Real time gas prices and heat rate can be viewed using the Curve spread screen Regards Arun x

Curve Manager Cc PST Hello All We have sucessfullly sorted some network issues in portland and the curve manager is ready to run on the local machine now The terminal server can be used as a backup in case the curve manager fails on the local machine I like to thank everyone for their efforts in getting this problem resolved Regards Arun

Final Report Cc PST Hi everyone Thank you very much for the valuable business insight and active feedback on position manager during the past week Based on the feedback from everyone we have made lot of changes in the new version of the application which was released last week and I think the system is working to everybodys satisfaction I would like to take this oppurtunity to sum up the features and options built inside the new position manager All the west regions and basis have been rolled out A feature has been added to the basis screen which enables traders to paste the basis points from excel New curve types Capacity and Volatility Smiles are included Positions can be viewed by both MWH and MW Positions can be viewed by Delivery Points Currently we are working on fixing some problems in getting the curve shift and hopefully we will roll that out by the end of this week We are also planning to add this application to the Enpower Launch Pad which will make migration easier I have noted down all the enhancement requests and we will try to get all those addressed in the next release Finally I would like to thank everyone on behalf of the entire risk team for devoting some time everyday to test this application We are striving hard to end this and migrate this application to production in the near future If you have any questions or concerns please feel free to call any of us listed below Arun Balasundaram Sivakumar Govindasamy Norman Lee Thanks Arun

FW Marking Curves For Tuesday PST The DBA is still in the process of migrating all the data to netco database The curve manager will be down until he is complete Regards Arun Original Message From Invedy Tantra Sent Tue AM To Lee Norman White Stacey W Evans Casey Postlethwaite John Reeves Kathy Nommensen Dave Cc Tang Mable Berger Michael Nat Steve Crooks William Balasundaram Arun Govindasamy Sivakumar Zheng Min Subject RE Marking Curves For Tuesday I am still importing the data on Netco database Whenever the import is completed I will let you know But for sure we already have an export file from Estate database as of pm last night tantra Original Message From Lee Norman Sent Monday February PM To White Stacey W Evans Casey Postlethwaite John Reeves Kathy Nommensen Dave Cc Tang Mable Invedy Tantra Berger Michael Nat Steve Crooks William Balasundaram Arun Govindasamy Sivakumar Zheng Min Subject Marking Curves For Tuesday Importance High Dear All After the Windows Accounts migration tonight our UBS traders will not be able to access the Estate EnPower Curve Manager We are going to copy all the existing Curve data and files from the Estate to the UBS servers tonight This would be the Final copy so the UBS Curve data is considered Production data Starting tomorrow please let the Estate Traders mark the Estate Curves and UBS traders mark the UBS Production curves Estate Curve Manager will NOT be available between PM and AM UBS Curve Manager will be available starting AM Please let us know if there is any questions or concerns Regards Norman PS Kathy please contact Min if you need help on Albertas Excel Position Managers Curve files
Curve manager Cc PST Hello All The curve manager is up and the traders can mark their curves Thanks Arun
